Effective communication: articulate communicator fostering collaboration and understanding
Patience: calm and tolerant in challenging situations
Open-mindedness: embraces new ideas and perspectives
Problem solving and critical thinking: analytical thinker adept at finding solutions
Time management: efficient organizer and deadline-oriented
Collaboration and teamwork: engages well in group settings to achieve common goals
Accountability: takes ownership and delivers with reliability
Commitment to lifelong learning: eager for continuous growth and skill development
